title: Conditional Function
code:
§function classify(n)
  §if n ⊗ 10
    §transmit "large"
  §else
    §transmit "small"
  §end_if
§end_function

§begin main
  §call classify(5)
  §call classify(15)
  §call classify(10)
§end
solution_description: function that classifies numbers as large or small based on a threshold
hints: The function checks if n is greater than 10
5 and 10 are not greater than 10, but 15 is
